name: HicksWillFix.com
overview:
HicksWillFix.com -The PC support online store is proud to present wide range of support and services to anyone from across the world. HicksWillFix.com is a new and revolutionary way of getting the PC support you need and getting it quickly.

The company provides a way for their clients to be able to come to the website and quickly receive any kind of support imaginable. Hicks Will Fix connects directly to the users computer through the internet and can initiate LIVE chat and complete control over the clients keyboard and mouse or can even analyze data from the computer in the background. Your business and family deserve high quality on-demand service and support. If you use your computer daily and are tired of how slow it responds or sick of error messages in your way, then â€œHicksWillFix.comâ€ is the right place for you. We are newly formed and operating out of Atlanta, GA.

Using remote connections via internet we can perform any task imaginable on your PC just as if there were a technician in your home. These abilities bring a whole new aspect to the IT support game. Most every computer user has had at several times been in a position where they wish they would have had someone to fix that error message or program conflict. Now, you don’t have to worry about any of those things with the quick and effecient services of HicksWillFix.com

We take pride in the level of service we deliver to our customers. Quality, clarity, attention to detail, and usefulness are at the core of everything we do. We never overlook what really matters: The basics. Great service, ease of use, honest pricing, and respect for our customerâ€™s time, money, and trust. We can instantly access and control your computers â€“ Macs as well as PCs. We can even provide service when youâ€™re away â€“ if you prefer.

By performing an extensive 52 step diagnostic scan, one of our Personal Technology Experts can speed up your computer and have it running as good as newâ€”all without costly hardware upgrades.

* Hard drive defragmentation
* Registry cleaning
* Windows optimization
* Check Startup programs
* Disk clean-up
* Remove viruses, spyware and malware
* Memory problems
* Faulty device drivers
* Operating system issues (e.g., Windows 7, Windows Vista, etc.)
* Check hard drive stability

and many moreâ€¦.

We also can perform tasks such as installing certain programs.

Are you a student? Need Microsoft Office? We CAN DO IT!

Want to learn how to find and download dvd quality movies to your hard-drive? We WILL SHOW YOU!
